reviewText: Exactly what the poster before me said. Nothing new here but the packaging and combined discs. Additionally, both dvd's are low rent, poorly produced, and boring! I wish I could return this. Extremely disappointed! Save your hard earned cash......

I bought this set because I thought it was a new collection. Both of the disks in this set are already available on amazon: Ozzy Osbourne Crown Prince Darkness Black Sabbbath Their Own Words The video is poor quality and obviously thrown together. It looks like a collection of clips someone downloaded from the Internet. They didn't even bother to assemble the clips in any kind of chronological or logical order. Don't expect any concert footage I'm keeping it because I'm a fan but I've seen most of it before.
